Title: Delves: The Waterworks
Description:
What a trip! Can ye believe how much exists below the depths here? 

The Machine Speakers were telling me of problems they're having over at a place called The Waterworks. Sounds like kobolds are making trouble again. They're also storing some treasure deeper within the place.

What do ye say? Let's go on an adventure and help out these folks!
ObjectivesText: Complete the Waterworks delve on any difficulty.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Brann Bronzebeard outside of the Waterworks.
RewardText:
In and out. No problems at all!

Except for this trapped chest in front of us.

Objectives.Text: Waterworks delves completed on any difficulty
